animal.question1: What food makes up nearly all (around 99%) of a Giant Panda’s diet?

animal.question2: True or false? Mice live for up to 10 years.

animal.answer2: False - Captive mice live for up to 2 and a half years while wild mice only live for an average of around 4 months.

animal.question3: What is the name of the phobia that involves an abnormal fear of spiders?

animal.question4: What is the largest type of ‘big cat’ in the world?

animal.answer4: The tiger, weighing up to 300 kilograms (660 pounds).

animal.question5: True or false? Crocodiles have no sweat glands so they use their mouths to release heat.

animal.answer5: True - They often sleep with their mouth open to cool down.

animal.question8: True or false? Bats are mammals.

animal.question9: Bees are found on every continent of earth except for one, which is it?

animal.question10: True or false? Cats spend an average of 13 to 14 hours a day sleeping.

animal.question11: What is the fastest land animal in the world?

animal.answer11: The cheetah (it can reach speeds of up to 120kph – 75mph).

animal.question12: A ‘doe’ is what kind of animal?

animal.question13: True or false? Cougar’s are herbivores.

animal.question14: Groups of lions are known as what?

animal.question16: What is the largest land animal in the world?

animal.answer16: The elephant - The largest on record weighed around 12,000 kilograms! (26,000 lb).

animal.question17: True of false? Snakes have slimy skin.

animal.answer17: False - Snakeskin is smooth and dry.

animal.question18: What is the only continent on earth where Giraffes live in the wild?

animal.question19: How many pairs of wings does a bee have?

animal.question20: What type of animal is the largest primate in the world?

animal.question21: Is a shark a fish or a mammal?

animal.question22: What is the most recognizable feature of a hedgehog’s appearance?

animal.question23: True or false? Owls are far-sighted, meaning that anything within a few inches of their eyes can’t be seen properly.

animal.question24: What is the name of an adult female horse?

animal.question26: What is the tallest animal in the world?

animal.answer26: The giraffe - The average height is around 5 metres (16ft) and the tallest on record stood nearly 6 metres (20 ft) tall.

animal.question27: True or false? Rabbits are born blind.

animal.question28: What is the most recognizable physical feature of the male lion?

animal.question29: How many legs does a spider have?

animal.question30: The crocodile species is believed to have been around for how long? 2 million years or 200 million years?
